activity-001.name: Sleep
activity-001.flyoutContent:
Sleep Guidelines

Getting adequate sleep is crucial for athletic performance and recovery. Aim for 8+ hours of quality sleep each night.

  • Maintain a consistent sleep schedule
  • Avoid screens 1 hour before bed
  • Keep your room cool and dark
  • Limit caffeine intake in the afternoon

activity-002.name: Hydration
activity-002.flyoutContent:
Hydration Tips

Stay hydrated throughout the day to maintain peak performance. Drink at least 8 glasses of water daily.

  • Drink water before, during, and after workouts
  • Monitor urine color (pale yellow is ideal)
  • Increase intake on hot days or intense training
  • Carry a water bottle with you

activity-005.name: Bodyweight Training
activity-005.flyoutContent:
Bodyweight Training

Complete 10 minutes of bodyweight exercises to build strength and endurance.

  • Push-ups: 3 sets of 10-15 reps
  • Squats: 3 sets of 15-20 reps
  • Plank: Hold for 30-60 seconds
  • Burpees: 2 sets of 5-10 reps
